author: mathisgd
content: hey all, do we know already approximately what will be the new values in https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-8038 ? thanks in advance (and sorry if it's not the right channel)

author: misilva73
content: This is the right place to ask, <@581801987495165962> . We still don't have number unfortunately. We are still working through benchmarking and data collection. You can follow the progress [here](https://github.com/misilva73/evm-gas-repricings/blob/main/reports/gas_repricings_todo.md)

author: mathisgd
content: thanks! do you have an idea of the timeline for all this to be settled?

author: misilva73
content: The goal is to have them ready by the end of the month
